Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Interfaces
  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Fields
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Constructors
  • Deprecated Enum Constants
  • Deprecated Interfaces 
    Interface Description
    com.googlecode.lanterna.terminal.ResizeListener
    Use TerminalResizeListener instead
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class Description
    com.googlecode.lanterna.CJKUtils
    Use TerminalTextUtils instead
    com.googlecode.lanterna.graphics.PropertiesTheme
    Use PropertyTheme instead, is behaves more like you would expect
  • Deprecated Fields 
    Field Description
    com.googlecode.lanterna.terminal.ansi.UnixTerminal.terminalSizeQuerier
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method Description
    com.googlecode.lanterna.terminal.ansi.StreamBasedTerminal.addKeyDecodingProfile(KeyDecodingProfile)
    Use getInputDecoder().addProfile(profile) instead
    com.googlecode.lanterna.CJKUtils.fitString(String, int)
    Use TerminalTextUtils.fitString(string, availableColumnSpace) instead
    com.googlecode.lanterna.CJKUtils.fitString(String, int, int)
    Use TerminalTextUtils.fitString(string, fromColumn, availableColumnSpace) instead
    com.googlecode.lanterna.CJKUtils.getColumnIndex(String, int)
    Use TerminalTextUtils.getColumnIndex(s, stringCharacterIndex) instead
    com.googlecode.lanterna.CJKUtils.getColumnWidth(String)
    Use TerminalTextUtils.getColumnWidth(s) instead
    com.googlecode.lanterna.CJKUtils.getStringCharacterIndex(String, int)
    Use TerminalTextUtils.getStringCharacterIndex(s, columnIndex instead
    com.googlecode.lanterna.graphics.ThemedTextGraphics.getTheme()
    Use the Theme attached to each component instead
    com.googlecode.lanterna.gui2.TextGUIGraphics.getTheme()
    com.googlecode.lanterna.graphics.ThemedTextGraphics.getThemeDefinition(Class<?>)
    Use the Theme attached to each component instead
    com.googlecode.lanterna.gui2.TextGUIGraphics.getThemeDefinition(Class<?>)
    com.googlecode.lanterna.CJKUtils.getTrueWidth(String)
    Call getColumnWidth(s) instead
    com.googlecode.lanterna.TerminalTextUtils.getTrueWidth(String)
    Call getColumnWidth(s) instead
    com.googlecode.lanterna.CJKUtils.isCharCJK(char)
    Use TerminalTextUtils.isCharJCK(c) instead
    com.googlecode.lanterna.terminal.swing.AWTTerminalFrame.setAutoCloseTrigger(TerminalEmulatorAutoCloseTrigger)
    Use
    com.googlecode.lanterna.gui2.AbstractWindow.setSize(TerminalSize)
    com.googlecode.lanterna.gui2.Window.setSize(TerminalSize)
    This method is deprecated now as it probably doesn't do what you think. Please use setFixedSize or setDecoratedSize instead, depending on what you are trying to do.
    com.googlecode.lanterna.gui2.TextGUIGraphics.withTheme(Theme)
    Now this method does nothing
  • Deprecated Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    com.googlecode.lanterna.gui2.MultiWindowTextGUI(Screen, TextColor)
    It's preferred to use a custom background component if you want to customize the background color, or change the theme
    com.googlecode.lanterna.terminal.ansi.UnixTerminal(InputStream, OutputStream, Charset, UnixTerminalSizeQuerier)
    Use an overload that doesn't take a UnixTerminalSizeQuerier
    com.googlecode.lanterna.terminal.ansi.UnixTerminal(InputStream, OutputStream, Charset, UnixTerminalSizeQuerier, UnixLikeTerminal.CtrlCBehaviour)
    Use an overload that doesn't take a UnixTerminalSizeQuerier
  • Deprecated Enum Constants 
    Enum Constant Description
    com.googlecode.lanterna.terminal.swing.TerminalEmulatorAutoCloseTrigger.DoNotAutoClose
